page.title: 18FASHION FOR TEENAGERS
page.content:
Teenaged girls like to wear fashionable clothes.In the summer teenaged girls usually wear dresses above their knees.Teenagers spend most of their money on clothes,hair,shoes and cosmetics. Most girls like to wear plenty of jewellery.A lot of girls have got their ears pierced.Even boys havetheir ears pierced sometimes. Both girls and boys like to wear their hair in different styles.Some even dye their hair. Denim jeans have been in fashion for a long time.Most teenagers wear jeans. Most girls like to wear make up to discos and special occasions.They wear
eye shadow, lipstick and nail varnish.
